title: SetBACnetStringProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD SetBACnetStringProperty
Sets the BACnet-String-Value of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object using a WSTRING.
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to set.

rows: The WSTRING value to set for the property.

The BACnet string type the WSTRING value is converted to
when setting the property.
